mapper.sql: fhb_contact_addr as fhbContactAddr , fhb_contact_phone as fhbContactPhone , for_help_by_type as forHelpByType , fhb_join_qty as fhbJoinQty , create_time as createTime , for_help_org as forHelpOrg , create_by as createBy , fhb_default_pic as fhbDefaultPic , fhb_rcv_goods_qty as fhbRcvGoodsQty , fhb_msg_type as fhbMsgType , fhb_contact as fhbContact , for_help_by as forHelpBy , fhb_rcv_love_qty as fhbRcvLoveQty , fhb_status as fhbStatus , update_by as updateBy , update_time as updateTime , fhb_pic as fhbPic , for_help_busi_type as forHelpBusiType , fhb_occur_datetime as fhbOccurDatetime , fhb_collection_qty as fhbCollectionQty , for_help_type as forHelpType , for_help_busi as forHelpBusi , fhb_occur_place as fhbOccurPlace , for_help_by_name as forHelpByName , fhb_comment_qty as fhbCommentQty , cw_help_msg_id as cwHelpMsgId , for_help_org_name as forHelpOrgName , fhb_detail_msg as fhbDetailMsg , fhb_life_status as fhbLifeStatus , for_help_by_pic as forHelpByPic
mapper.insert:
insert into cw_for_help_msg( fhb_contact_addr ,
fhb_contact_phone ,
for_help_by_type ,
fhb_join_qty ,
create_time ,
for_help_org ,
create_by ,
fhb_default_pic ,
fhb_rcv_goods_qty ,
fhb_msg_type ,
fhb_contact ,
for_help_by ,
fhb_rcv_love_qty ,
fhb_status ,
update_by ,
update_time ,
fhb_pic ,
for_help_busi_type ,
fhb_occur_datetime ,
fhb_collection_qty ,
for_help_type ,
for_help_busi ,
fhb_occur_place ,
for_help_by_name ,
fhb_comment_qty ,
cw_help_msg_id ,
for_help_org_name ,
fhb_detail_msg ,
fhb_life_status ,
for_help_by_pic
) values ( #{fhbContactAddr } , #{fhbContactPhone } , #{forHelpByType } , #{fhbJoinQty } , #{createTime } , #{forHelpOrg } , #{createBy } , #{fhbDefaultPic } , #{fhbRcvGoodsQty } , #{fhbMsgType } , #{fhbContact } , #{forHelpBy } , #{fhbRcvLoveQty } , #{fhbStatus } , #{updateBy } , #{updateTime } , #{fhbPic } , #{forHelpBusiType } , #{fhbOccurDatetime } , #{fhbCollectionQty } , #{forHelpType } , #{forHelpBusi } , #{fhbOccurPlace } , #{forHelpByName } , #{fhbCommentQty } , #{cwHelpMsgId } , #{forHelpOrgName } , #{fhbDetailMsg } , #{fhbLifeStatus } , #{forHelpByPic } )
